reviews.review: No por algo es uno de los mejores juegos de la historia.. No solo reviví mi infancia como físico teórico en Black Mesa, sino también catapultó una experiencia a otro nivel... Vuelves a ser Gordon Freeman para salvar al mundo de un inevitable caos, armado siempre con tu infaltable Crowbar :)
One of the best games entirely (IMO)

Still one of the best shooters, at least storywise. you may not like the graphics but the characters, story and scenery is still top notch. i still like playing it from time to time with a little bit of hope for EP3 or HL3... one can only dream :/

if you really dislike the graphics you could try cinematic mod. it's still buggy (at least the 2013 version) and i don't like the new HD character skins but otherwise it's a great overhaul of the textures and levels.
Really good storyline, old but amazing! 8/10 on my ranking because of graphics and such.

Crowbar...'nuf said.

10/10 would beat in Combine skull again
What can I say that hasn't been said. If you own a computer, play this.
Even now, this game is a piece of art.

The simple fact that people are still commenting on this game just goes to show that it may be old but it will never be forgotten. I personally believe that this is one of the best made games ever created and will continue to be just that for years to come. This game is defiantly worth buying not only for the hours of gameplay it offers but also because it opens a door into the world of source mods, with a few on the free to play section of the steam store. 10/10

What is there to say about this game? A LOT! First off, if you love Sci-Fi and adventure/action games, then this game is right for you! This game tells the story of a scientist who has to save the world from a cataclysmic event triggering a dark energy portal being used by a man named Dr. Breene. You meet many frineds and enemies along the way as you travel throughout the post-apocalyptic looking earth. This game is also a very detailed puzzle game as it helps you to think and use your brain on how to do stuff on certain levels. Overall, this game is rated 10/10. I would buy it as soon as you have enough money and once you start playing it you'll realize how fun it is. Oh and I almost forgot, if you want to know the whole story, first try playing Half Life 1 and then play Half Life 2.

Half Life 3 please come out soon.

Sincerely,
Everyone

Lembro que joguei o Half-Life 1 num PC no trampo do meu pai, faz tantos anos, ainda me lembro como fiquei feliz descobrindo aquele jogo novo e me botei a prova de zerar aquilo, demorou bastante e consegui e naquele mesmo tempo, numa revista daquelas de jogos, bem antiga, a galera mais velha sabe como era. Vi na capa "Half-Life 2" nossa, eu fiquei tão feliz que teria uma continuação, enchi o saco do meu pai pra comprar um pc, mas não pegava, daí meu tio me ajudou com as peças e dei um Upgrade nele, nossa, fiquei tão maravilhado com aqueles gráficos em relação ao primeiro jogo, toda a jogabilidade, a física, tudo simplesmente perfeito.
Half-Life 2 é um jogo que marcou muito pra mim, a grande história que o jogo tem, todos os seus mistérios, que faz a gente jogar inúmeras vezes, eu sempre jogava pirata, mas conheci a Steam no tempo que conheci Half-Life 1 e no tempo só era feita a compra com Dólar, mas hoje, juntando meu dinheiro, finalmente comprei e recomendo a todos que não conhecem esse grande jogo, que mesmo hoje com tantos jogos fodas, ainda me deixa maravilhado como  se fosse a primeira vez, jogo mais que recomendado e que venha o Half-Life 3! :D
Крутая игра, прошел раз 100!

Muy bueno

Come on, is a review even necessary?  It's freakin' HL2!  Game of the decade, game of the year, and and shit ton of other awards.  The gameplay and story are great and the graphics still hold up today.  Gordon Freeman is a boss, the voice acting is damn good, the weapons are great, especially the Gravity Gun, and the game is fairly challenging.   

However the reason that I think that this is the greatest game ever made is not even because of the game itself, but because of its impact on the gaming world.  Few games have better modding communities than this game.  Gmod, The Stanley Parable, Fistful of Frags, and many others.  The same arguement could be made for HL1, but I think that HL2's modding communkity is more prevelant than its predecessor.  

You are not a gamer if you don't play this game, in my opinion.  Unfortunately, Gaben will never give us HL3 because he is too busy eating cupcakes and having sex with Steam's sales figures to continue making games, but that doesn't mean that you shouldn't play this game.  I give it a 100/10.

This game is visually stunning! And it feels great to say that about a game from 2004. The combination of immersive scenery, great gameplay, and a spectacular story line gives this game it's fame. While I do not love it as much as I do Half Life 1, it is still a must play for any fans of the series.
пожалуй, лучшая в своём жанре

HλLF-LIFE2 is a game in the Half Life Series and is much better than its prequel, Half Life 1. Half Life 2 has many likable characters, not including the protagonist Gordan Freeman who never utters a word. 

This game has great graphics, an enjoyable story, good physics and good GUI. 

The only cons to this game are some puzzles and combat scenes are repetitive and there is very little new things introduced after the first several hours. After those two hours you play with the same weapons and enemies for most of the game.
Overall, I would reccomend this game and believe it is definitely worth the price.

My pesonal review of Half-Life 2
So I first start with positive points:
+ Long and good story
+ Good Weapons (Gravity Gun)
+ Fun to play
+ No long and boring cutscenes
+ No stupid shooting, you have also to combine things
+ FPS Atmosphere without a HUD which gets in your way
+ Nice Jumpscares
+ Varied Gameplay

Here are the negatives points:
- No clear Objectives (only in Dialogs)
